ygData.subject: Re: enchant armor
ygData.msgSnippet: The place to get enchant silver is Neriak I beleive.  I also think that is the only place to get the spell, so get a DE that you trust to go buy it for him
ygData.messageBody:
The place to get enchant silver is Neriak I beleive. I also think that is
the only place to get the spell, so get a DE that you trust to go buy it for
him unless you or he is a DE of course.

As far as making magical armro goes, I only know of bracers that can be made
at the moment. And they have an AC of 0, but some other magical bonuses to
int and wiz i think... Cant remember exactly.

Dyvim Kincaid
Stormriders of Cazic Thule

> -----Original Message-----
> From: mark mark [mailto:markerob@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, June 23, 1999 10:14 AM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] enchant armor
>
>
> From: mark mark <markerob@...>
>
>
> This is not really a warrior question, but you guys might know
> how to do it.
> I have an enchanter friend who would like to enchant ore in
> order to make
> magical armor. We have looked forever trying to find the spell
> to enchant
> ore but can't. I'm sure you guys can understand the importance
> of magical
> armor. Anyway we want to make it to sell cheap to other players.
> If anyone
> has played around with this or knows anything about it please tell.
>
> Arathorne, Solsek Ro
